data.message: Comprehensive Duro production readiness check: All core systems operational. Fixed 2 bugs: (1) rules.py key mismatch - now shows 13 rules instead of 0, (2) duro_query_archive truncation - prevents context overflow. 35/35 enforcement tests pass, 7/7 smoke tests pass. 11 evals need skill_path (workflow evals, not blockers). System is production-ready.
data.outcome: All core systems operational.
